content: this is a fun mosaic pattern that can be used for all kinds of projects instructions included in this set are for coaster placemat and runner an intermediate skill level and a basic understanding of mosaic crochet technique is helpful but not required **dimensions** in inches coaster 4 5x4 5 placemat 13x18 runner 12 5x32 a sugarwheel cotton was used instead of premier cotton sprout which altered the gauge slightly **american terms used** slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet **materials used** caron cotton ripple cakes meadow sugarwheel cotton solids nutmeg discontinued substituted premier cotton sprout dk cranberry scissors 3 75mm crochet hook **yarn notes ** **color 1** caron cotton ripple cakes meadow i used one cake 491 yards to make two placemats one coasters and one table runner table runner was made with 3 repeats 93 row total **color 2** used to make the runner sugarwheel cotton solids i used one cake 335 yards to make one table runner i still had enough left over to make a coaster but chose not to **color 2** used to make the placemat & coaster premier cotton sprout i used one donut ball 230 yards to make a coaster and a placemat
